The article: s headline stated that the World Health Organization (WHO) designated the Russian Covid-19 vaccine as the official inoculation against the coronavirus.
The article mentioned that Russia: s Direct Investment Fund (RDIF) applied to the WHO for emergency use of its vaccine.
The WHO: s website clearly states that there are no medicines or vaccines that have been shown to prevent or cure Covid-19, and it has not designated any specific vaccine as the official inoculation.
